brainly_data.question:
Read the list of words.
dermatologist
epiderm
hypoderm
taxidermist
pachyderms
Based on the common root, all of these words relate to _______.
a 
science
b 
skin
c 
medicine
d 
transportation
brainly_data.subject: English
